recipes.label: Repair Ship?
recipes.startdescription: These men can fashion the Kite with new wings of canvas and skin of wood, But only if I can pay them for their work.

recipes.label: Industrious Echoes.
recipes.startdescription: I linger, and hum along to the hammersong. The shipwrights activity accelerated to a frenzy, and work of a day is done in an hour. The heat has become unbearable, and I leave before the tar catches flame.

recipes.label: Repairs needed
recipes.startdescription: If the shipwrights can tell what caused this damage they do not say; they only tell me the price.

slots.label: Cost
slots.description: The tools are ready, the tar has been boiled, now all that rests is the matter of payment. [pay 1 funds for each instance of damage you want to repair]

recipes.label: Repairs Paid
recipes.description: Planks replaced, mast mended and sails refurbished. Whatever philosophers may bicker, I know for sure this ship is still my own.

recipes.label: No Deal Made
recipes.description: The ship is slipped back into the water, still afloat, but no better of.

recipes.label: Nothing to repair
recipes.startdescription: The ship is slipped back into the water.
